entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Saugeen Shores
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 00:14 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -13.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Wiarton Airport 02:00 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023
Condition: Clear
Temperature: -13.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.7 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 91 %
Wind Chill: -18
Dewpoint: -14.7°C
Wind: E 7 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Clearing near midnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming southeast 20 late this evening. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the morning then snow beginning in the afternoon. Amount 2 cm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 70. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow or rain. Low minus 1 with temperature rising to plus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow or ice pellets changing to periods of rain or light snow mixed with drizzle near midnight. Risk of freezing rain late in the evening. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 cm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming west 50 gusting to 70 overnight. Low minus 1 with temperature rising to plus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 9 in the evening. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of flurries. High plus 2. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 26 February 2023
